fairy_sparklers.name: Fairy Sparklers
fairy_sparklers.description: Multi-colored sparklers that are safe for any age.

bottle_rockets.name: Bottle Rockets
bottle_rockets.description: Bottle Rockets launch into the air with a bang at the end.

firecrackers.name: Firecrackers
firecrackers.description: A small explosive device primarily designed to produce noise.

gerbs.name: Gerbs
gerbs.description: Gerbs produce a jet of sparks lasting between 15 and 60 seconds.

saxons.name: Saxons
saxons.description: The Saxon is a rapidly spinning ground based firework.

flash_pots.name: Flash Pots
flash_pots.description: Short metal pot used with binary powders creating flash, smoke or sparks

cakes.name: Cakes
cakes.description: A series of small aerial shells connected together by a high-speed fuse.

kamuro.name: Kamuro
kamuro.description: A dense burst ofsilver or gold stars which leave a heavy glitter trail.

palms.name: Palms
palms.description: A shell containing a relatively few large comet stars.

w54.name: W54
w54.description: A very compact implosion-type nuclear weapon design.

m29.name: M-29 Davy Crockett Weapon System
m29.description: A tactical nuclear recoilless gun for firing the M-388 nuclear projectile (sold seperately).

w89.name: W89
w89.description: 200 kiloton warhead for the tactical Sea Lance anti-submarine depth charge.

mark_14.name: Mark 14
mark_14.description: Solid-fuel staged hydrogen bomb with a yield of 6.9 Mt.

castle_bravo.name: Castle Bravo
castle_bravo.description: Lithium-deuteride-fueled thermonuclear weapon with a yield of 15 Mt.

b57.name: B57
b57.description: 20 Mt. bomb tailored for super-sonic flight.

tsar_bomba.name: Tsar Bomba
tsar_bomba.description: Soviet RDS-220 hydrogen bomb with a yield of 50 megaton TNT.

b41.name: B41
b41.description: Three-stage thermonuclear weapon primarily boosted by deuterium-tritium.

tx_21.name: TX-21
tx_21.description: The TX-21 uses lithium deuteride fusion fuel (37% to 40% enriched Lithium-6 deuteride enclosed in a natural uranium tamper).
